short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically selects your last played format when you load Pokemon Showdown

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automatically selects your last played format when you load Pokemon Showdown. It will always be free, even though I had to pay to post this here - but please consider donating at https://paypal.me/JakobSchwarz
